mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, img_addr, product_desc, normal_price, promotion_price, create_time, enable_status, priority, last_edit_time, shop_id, product_category_id from tb_product where shop_id = #{shopId}

select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.img_addr, p.product_desc, p.normal_price, p.promotion_price, p.create_time, p.point, p.enable_status, p.priority, p.last_edit_time, p.shop_id, p.product_category_id, pm.product_img_id, pm.img_addr as dateil_img, pm.img_desc, pm.priority, pm.create_time from tb_product p left join tb_product_img pm on p.product_id = pm.product_id where p.product_id = #{productId} order by pm.priority DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product (product_name, img_addr, product_desc, normal_price, promotion_price, create_time, enable_status, priority, point, last_edit_time, product_category_id, shop_id) values (#{productName}, #{imgAddr}, #{productDesc}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotionPrice}, #{createTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{priority}, #{point}, #{lastEditTime}, #{productCategory.productCategoryId}, #{shop.shopId})
mapper.update:
update tb_product
product_id=#{productId}, product_name=#{productName}, product_desc=#{productDesc}, img_addr=#{imgAddr}, normal_price=#{normalPrice}, promotion_price=#{promotionPrice}, priority=#{priority}, enable_status=#{enableStatus}, shop_id=#{shop.shopId}, point=#{point},
product_category_id=#{productCategory.productCategoryId},
where product_id =#{productId} and shop_id = #{shop.shopId}
